body_html:
Some other function, e.g. sparse_softmax_cross_entropy_with_logits also have this breaking change. These need to be documented in RELEASE.md.

But in one function: tf.nn.weighted_cross_entropy_with_logits , positional arguments are not disallowed. This may lead to silent failure.
body_text:
Some other function, e.g. sparse_softmax_cross_entropy_with_logits also have this breaking change. These need to be documented in RELEASE.md.
But in one function: tf.nn.weighted_cross_entropy_with_logits , positional arguments are not disallowed. This may lead to silent failure.
body:
Some other function, e.g. sparse_softmax_cross_entropy_with_logits also have this breaking change. These need to be documented in RELEASE.md.

But in one function: [tf.nn.weighted_cross_entropy_with_logits](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/g3doc/api_docs/python/functions_and_classes/shard8/tf.nn.weighted_cross_entropy_with_logits.md) , positional arguments are not disallowed. This may lead to silent failure.
